idea:
UPCEM BUSINESS SPHERE

UPCEM Engineering & Consultancy Pvt Ltd offers unique services in Upstream Oil & Gas, Refinery, Petrochemical, Fertilizer and Chemical Sector and is one point solution provider for PMC,

Process Scheme finalization, Process Optimization, Engineering coordination, Engineering Document Review with DEP/API and approvals from Client, Design verification with regulatory requirement viz. OISD, Event organizer for Safety Studies workshop and it’s timely Close-out, Complete Pre-commissioning & Commissioning, HVAC etc., Performance run test strategy formulation and facilitating Project Handover for Upstream / Mid-downstream Process Platform and Onshore Projects.


                                                        Upcem Operates in Major Five Verticals

1. Technical:

 Detailed Engineering & Design for Civil,Structural,Piping,Mech.,E&I and process discipline.

 Process Simulation

 Basic Engineering & Design Packages

 Static Stress Analysis

 Dynamic Stress Analysis**

 CFD**

 Safety/OISD/Statutory Audit

 HVAC**consulting, Design and Engineering

 Certification

 Third Party Inspection**

 NDT Services

 FEED

 Cost Analysis & Project Feasibility Studies**

 Pre-Comm & Comm / PGTR For Plants & Installation

 Commissioning of Oil & Gas Systems, Petrochemical Unit

 De-comm For Plants & Installation**

 Plant Trouble shooting & Debottlenecking.

 Plant mothballing & Demothballing.

 Operator’s/Engineer,s “Plant Operational Training”.


 2. Manpower Assistance:

 Highly SKILLED/Skilled/Semi Skilled/unskilled Manpower Supply

 Bagging & Warehouse Operational and maint. for PP/Fertilizers/Solid Handling 

 QC Lab Assistance & Manpower Supply

 Manpower for Project Assistance

 Safety & HSE Supervision

 Maintenance Planning

 HVAC Maintenance Planning**

 Catalyst loading Manpower Assistance

 Operational & Maintenance Assistance**for CPP/refinery/Petrochemical/Chemical/Fertilizer/Offshore

 Manpower Supply For Routine Jobs in Refinery/Fertilizer/Chemical/Power Plant/ Offshore Industries 

 Warehouse Management For PP/Fertilizers/Solid Handling**

 Static/Rotary Equipment Overhauling**


 3. Chemicals Supply & Services: 

 Sales and Marketing of water treatment / formulated / bulk Chemicals.

 Chemical Cleaning of Process Equipment & Piping.

 Chemical Treatment of Cooling water/Boiler Feed water / Fire water Network circuit etc.

 Supply and management of STP/HOT oil/ other Utilities at process plants.

 Supply and management of water treatment / formulated / bulk chemicals.

 Treatment and Hazardous waste treatment management


 4. Management Services:

 Construction Management Consulting

 Refinery Operational Management**

 Project Management Consultancy

 Procurement Management for Project**

 Contract Management for Project**


 5. Risks:

 Safety Studies/Risk Studies/HAZID-HAZOP-SIL-QRA-SIMOPS-RA-FEA-ESRA-ERDMP

for FPSO, MOPU, Offshore Process Platforms, Well heads, Pipelines, Refinery, Petrochemical, fertilizer and chemical process plants.
